|New background art. Ships with [[Strigi]] and [[Dolphin (file manager)|Dolphin]] by default. [[Qt (toolkit)|Qt]] port of GDebi graphical installer for [[deb (file format)|package files]]. Includes Restricted Drivers Manager for the first time.<ref>{{cite web | url=http://kubuntu.org/announcements/7.10-release.php | title=Kubuntu 7.10 Release Notes | accessdate=2007-11-01}}</ref> New kubuntu-restricted-extras package is available for download from the repositories.
